alert.note: Alert for Ford; Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:34AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Livingston and Ford Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 533 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Fairbury to near Cooksville to Clinton. Movement was east at 35 mph. Bloomington regional airport recently gusted to 43 mph with this outflow. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paxton, Fairbury, Gibson City, Chatsworth, Forrest, Piper City, Melvin, Roberts, Elliott, Sibley and Strawn. Including the following interstate... I-57 near mile marker 258. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
